speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Erika Meijer, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on the 2006 Progress Report on the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia ( 2006/2289(INI) ) ( A6-0214/2007 ).
